thread.section_title: BliVakker omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av BliVakker | www.blivakker.no
thread.title: Valery

author: Valery
title: Valery
text: These guys are working perfect! Thanks to free shipping on everything I can buy as often as I want. F.eks., bought shampoo, forgot conditioner - no problem, make another purchase and don't pay more than a product price. Prices are really good! I went to cosmetologist to consult on skincare cosmetics, but instead of salon bought it at Blivakker, haha)) Delivery is really fast, and I like that they send you messages on each stage of delievery: sending and actual delievery stage. When your order consists of several items, they put you smth extra for free - so cute :) And another thing I like is assortment! There are both middle-level and high-end products sold in beauty salons! Good job, blivakker!
